title: TUI view improvements
description: Refine the tk view TUI with better styling, color coding, layout fixes, and potential Bubbles component integration
notes:
2026-01-11 15:02 - Warning: could not mark  as in_progress: tk update  --status in_progress: invalid id: id is required
2026-01-11 15:04 - Completed ycq (fix top border). Search/filter/focus indicators now display in left panel header instead of as prepended lines. The header dynamically shows 'Ticks', 'Search: X', 'Filter: X', or 'Focus: X' based on current mode.
